reviews.text: It's a train station... lots of CCTV coverage, car park and spots to store bikes and a ticket office that's open sometimes. There is also  terminal to load up your smartcard.

If you live near the golf course and have a train to catch, this is THE place to go. Every 30 mins or so a train will come to whisk you off towards Glasgow Central or Neilston. Although why anyone would want to go to Neilston is beyond me. Platform, ticket office, one of those metal stands that holds lots of copies of the Metro that nobody wants to read. What more could you ask for?
